channel.title: The Client Basicism?
channel.description:
Ok, I have a v16 client for deltascape, but the run.bat doesn't seem to be working. It pops up then goes away quickly. I believe it is saying that the main class doesn't work. I know this to mean my path isn't set properly; however, upon looking at my environmental variables, they are set correctly. Plus, the run.bat file only has the following:
@ECHO OFF Legendzz Client V2 JAVA -Xmx500m EGUI
so what do I need to do to make this work? Post links if allready discussed.
-mawang

item.title: The Client Basicism?
item.dc:creator: @mawang mawang
item.description:
@mawang wrote:

Ok, I have a v16 client for deltascape, but the run.bat doesn’t seem to be working. It pops up then goes away quickly. I believe it is saying that the main class doesn’t work. I know this to mean my path isn’t set properly; however, upon looking at my environmental variables, they are set correctly. Plus, the run.bat file only has the following:

@ECHO OFF
Legendzz Client V2
JAVA -Xmx500m EGUI

so what do I need to do to make this work? Post links if allready discussed.

-mawang
